statements: SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, timestamp FROM medical_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, patient_name FROM medical_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT MAX(record_id) AS max_record_id FROM medical_records;
SELECT record_id, patient_name FROM medical_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN doctors ON patients.patient_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE patients.patient_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialty FROM patients JOIN doctors ON patients.first_name = doctors.first_name WHERE doctors.specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, encrypted_medical_record FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors;
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, encrypted_medical_record FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctors.doctor_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM doctors JOIN medical_records ON doctors.doctor_id = medical_records.doctor_id;

SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.record_date, doctors.specialty FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id JOIN doctors ON medical_records.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE doctors.specialty = 'Cardiology';

SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis, medical_records.prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE medical_records.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT patient_name, timestamp FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_id = 100;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT block_id, network_size FROM BlockchainNetwork WHERE node_address LIKE '%node%';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Ave';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BlockchainNetwork WHERE network_size > 100 ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, office_location FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT user_id, username, creation_date FROM BlockchainUsers WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history->'allergies' FROM Patients WHERE medical_history->'allergies' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, office_location FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_details->'amount', transaction_status FROM BlockTransactions WHERE transaction_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
